title: China today. No. 8102
creator_credit: Film Studio of the Peoples Republic of China
brief_description: Shows various views of China: new housing in Beijing’ cloud design brocades; the desire of an overseas Chinese; the famous “Bai Feng Wan” pills; extracts from the dance drama “Flying to the moon”.
